inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
customEvents
| extend DialogId = customDimensions['DialogId']
| where isnotempty(DialogId)
| top-nested of bin(timestamp, 1d) by countif(name == "WaterfallComplete"),
  top-nested of bin(timestamp, 1d) by countif(name == "WaterfallStart"),
  top-nested of tostring(DialogId) by count()
| project Percentage=aggregated_timestamp * 1.0 / aggregated_timestamp1, timestamp, tostring(DialogId) 
| render timechart

content.Query:
customEvents
| where name=="WaterfallStart"
| extend DialogId = customDimensions['DialogId']
| join kind=leftouter (customEvents | where name=="WaterfallComplete") on operation_Id 
| summarize starts=countif(name=='WaterfallStart'), completes=countif(name1=='WaterfallComplete') by bin(timestamp, 1d), tostring(DialogId)
| project Percentage=max_of(0.0, completes * 1.0 / starts), timestamp, tostring(DialogId) 
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
customEvents
| extend DialogId = customDimensions['DialogId']
| where isnotempty(DialogId)
| top-nested of bin(timestamp, 1d) by countif(name == "WaterfallCancel"),
  top-nested of bin(timestamp, 1d) by countif(name == "WaterfallStart"),
  top-nested of tostring(DialogId) by count()
| project Percentage=aggregated_timestamp * 1.0 / aggregated_timestamp1, timestamp, tostring(DialogId) 
| render timechart

content.Query:
customEvents
| where name=="WaterfallStart"
| extend DialogId = customDimensions['DialogId']
| join kind=leftouter (customEvents | where name=="WaterfallCancel") on operation_Id 
| summarize starts=countif(name=='WaterfallStart'), completes=countif(name1=='WaterfallCancel') by bin(timestamp, 1d), tostring(DialogId)
| project Percentage=max_of(0.0, completes * 1.0 / starts), timestamp, tostring(DialogId) 
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
customEvents
| extend DialogId = customDimensions['DialogId']
| where isnotempty(DialogId)
| top-nested of bin(timestamp, 1d) by countif(name == "WaterfallCancel"),
  top-nested of bin(timestamp, 1d) by countif(name == "WaterfallStart"),
  top-nested of bin(timestamp, 1d) by countif(name == "WaterfallComplete"),
  top-nested of tostring(DialogId) by count()
| project Percentage=(aggregated_timestamp1 - (aggregated_timestamp + aggregated_timestamp2) * 1.0) / aggregated_timestamp1, timestamp, tostring(DialogId) 
| render timechart

content.Query:
customEvents
| where name=="WaterfallStart"
| extend DialogId = customDimensions['DialogId']
| join kind=leftouter (customEvents | where name=="WaterfallComplete") on operation_Id 
| join kind=leftouter (customEvents | where name=="WaterfallCancel") on operation_Id 
| summarize starts=countif(name=='WaterfallStart'), cancels=countif(name=='WaterfallCancel'), completes=countif(name1=='WaterfallComplete') by bin(timestamp, 1d), tostring(DialogId)
| project Percentage=max_of(0.0, (starts-(completes+cancels)) * 1.0 / starts), timestamp, tostring(DialogId) 
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
customEvents
| extend intent=case(name startswith "LuisIntent", name, "")
| top-nested of bin(timestamp, 1d) by countif(name == "WaterfallComplete"),    
 top-nested of bin(timestamp, 1d) by countif(name == "WaterfallStart"), 
 top-nested of tostring(intent) by count()
| where isnotempty(intent)
| project Percentage=(aggregated_timestamp * 1.0) / aggregated_timestamp1, timestamp, tostring(intent) 
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
customEvents
| extend intent=case(name startswith "LuisIntent", name, "")
| top-nested of bin(timestamp, 1d) by countif(name == "WaterfallCancel"),    
 top-nested of bin(timestamp, 1d) by countif(name == "WaterfallStart"), 
 top-nested of tostring(intent) by count()
| where isnotempty(intent)
| project Percentage=(aggregated_timestamp * 1.0) / aggregated_timestamp1, timestamp, tostring(intent) 
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
customEvents
| extend intent=case(name startswith "LuisIntent", name, "")
| top-nested of bin(timestamp, 1d) by countif(name == "WaterfallComplete"),    
top-nested of bin(timestamp, 1d) by countif(name == "WaterfallStart"),
top-nested of bin(timestamp, 1d) by countif(name == "WaterfallCancel"),
top-nested of tostring(intent) by count()
| where isnotempty(intent)
| project Percentage=max_of(0, (aggregated_timestamp1 - (aggregated_timestamp+aggregated_timestamp2))) * 1.0 / aggregated_timestamp1, timestamp, tostring(intent) 
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
customEvents
| where name startswith "LuisIntent"  
| where timestamp > ago(24d) 
| summarize count() by bin(timestamp, 1d), name
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
customEvents
| join  (
  customEvents 
   | where name == "WaterfallComplete" 
   | where timestamp > ago(24d)
   | project operation_Id
   | join (
     customEvents
     | where name == "WaterfallStart"
     | project operation_Id)
     on operation_Id) 
    on operation_Id
| where name startswith "LuisIntent"
| summarize count() by bin(timestamp, 1d), name 
| render barchart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
customEvents 
   | where name == "WaterfallStart" 
   | where timestamp > ago(24d)   
   | extend DialogId = customDimensions['DialogId']
   | join (
     customEvents
     | where name == "WaterfallComplete" and isnotempty(operation_Id)
     )
     on operation_Id
   | summarize count() by bin(timestamp, 1d), tostring(DialogId)
   | render barchart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
customEvents
| where timestamp > ago(24d) 
| extend DialogId = customDimensions['DialogId']
| where name == "WaterfallStep"
| summarize count() by bin(timestamp, 1h), tostring(DialogId), user_Id
| summarize avg(count_) by tostring(DialogId)
| render barchart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
customEvents
| where name=="WaterfallStart"
| extend DialogId = customDimensions['DialogId']
| join kind=leftouter (customEvents | where name=="WaterfallCancel") on operation_Id 
| join kind=leftouter (customEvents | where name=="WaterfallComplete") on operation_Id 
| extend duration = case(not(isnull(timestamp1)), timestamp1 - timestamp, 
                       not(isnull(timestamp2)), timestamp2 - timestamp, 
                       now()-timestamp)
| summarize avg(duration) by bin(timestamp, 1d),  tostring(DialogId)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
customEvents
| where name startswith("LuisIntent")
| extend SentimentLabel = customDimensions['SentimentLabel']
| extend SentimentScore = customDimensions['SentimentScore']
| summarize percentiles(todouble(SentimentScore),50,95,99) by bin(timestamp, 1h), tostring(SentimentLabel)
| render timechart
